name: BBQ Snack Mix
author: Lukelliott
summary: This is such a delicious and simple BBQ snack mix! This recipe can easily be doubled or tripled. Be careful though--it can be addictive.
ingredients: 1 (12.4 ounce) package cheese-flavored crackers (such as Cheez-It®)
2 cups crispy rice cereal squares (such as Rice Chex®)
4 tablespoons vegetable oil, or more as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine crackers, pretzels, cereal squares, and peanuts in a large bowl
Slowly drizzle oil over cracker mixture and gently stir mixture with your hands until well coated, adding more oil, if necessary
Combine barbecue seasoning and paprika in a small bowl
Add to cracker mixture and toss gently until coated
Spread out on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring halfway through
Allow to fully cool before serving or storing
